mapper.insert: insert into board (user_no, subject, content) value (#{userNo}, #{subject}, #{content});
mapper.update: update board set subject = #{subject}, content = #{content}, modified_time = now() where article_no = #{articleNo}
mapper.select: select article_no, user.user_no,user_name, subject, content, readcount, register_time, modified_time from board join user on board.user_no = user.user_no where article_no = #{articleNo};
